body:
Currently failing 6% of builds.

https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/4fcce9a2-34c1-4ff1-b7b8-949037829f04
https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/c97c73d8-4c8a-40f7-be6c-414e58a17106
https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/675f1e60-2b29-4580-bfc5-c9d3cb13f347
https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/c8f33561-b7c8-4df3-850a-baecb3b72c03

First occurrence on 2018-05-21 00:33:00.000 UTC - looks like this got recently introduced?

This is trivial to reproduce 
`tools/run_tests/run_tests.py -l c -c tsan -r 'compress_nosec_test.*retry_streaming_succeeds_before_replay_finished' -n 200`

Git bisect shows this was introduced by https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/15402.

```
25c57a38bfebed94c5043e2fc39786e7eeb9929d is the first bad commit
commit 25c57a38bfebed94c5043e2fc39786e7eeb9929d
Author: Juanli Shen <juanlishen@google.com>
Date:   Thu May 17 09:44:07 2018 -0700

    Include other usage to estimate call size
```

@AspirinSJL  this is easy to reproduce (see command above), please fix ASAP or revert.
No idea how #15402 can introduce this data race.. Reverting.
Can't revert automatically because of change in between. I will create a new PR after standup.

So we need to synchronize the [call release](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/master/src/core/lib/surface/call.cc#L520) and [call combiner access](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/master/src/core/lib/iomgr/call_combiner.cc#L109). The reason that this data race doesn't happen before might be that before my PR the initial zone of the arena is never used and call data is stored from the second zone. So when the arena is destroyed, the initial zone destruction adds in some time gap after last access to the call combiner to avoid the race.

It's strange that I can't see the "before checking call combiner size .." log for the data access that causes the race. All the "before" and "after" logs match in pairs.  

```
I0523 16:45:58.645943407  247324 call_combiner.cc:111]       -- before checking call combiner size at 0x7b9000000040
I0523 16:45:58.645953588  247324 call_combiner.cc:114]       after checking call combiner size at 0x7b9000000040
I0523 16:45:58.646009091  247324 call_combiner.cc:109]       release = 0 
I0523 16:45:58.646025916  247324 call_combiner.cc:111]       -- before checking call combiner size at 0x7b9000000040
I0523 16:45:58.646039204  247324 call_combiner.cc:114]       after checking call combiner size at 0x7b9000000040
I0523 16:45:58.646164568  247324 call_combiner.cc:109]       release = 0 
I0523 16:45:58.646191301  247324 call_combiner.cc:111]       -- before checking call combiner size at 0x7b9000000040
I0523 16:45:58.646215746  247324 call_combiner.cc:114]       after checking call combiner size at 0x7b9000000040
I0523 16:45:58.646270241  247299 call.cc:519]                release = 1 
I0523 16:45:58.646288888  247299 call.cc:522]                call combiner destroyed 0x7b9000000040
I0523 16:45:58.646300321  247299 arena.cc:109]               arena=0x7b9000000010
I0523 16:45:58.646312980  247299 alloc.cc:100]               to gpr_free 0x7b9000000000
==================

    #0 free ??:? (h2_compress_nosec_test+0x429f2a)
    #1 gpr_free /usr/local/google/home/juanlishen/wip/revert_arena_fix/grpc/src/core/lib/gpr/alloc.cc:77 (h2_compress_nosec_test+0x67ed54)
    #2 gpr_free_aligned /usr/local/google/home/juanlishen/wip/revert_arena_fix/grpc/src/core/lib/gpr/alloc.cc:101 (h2_compress_nosec_test+0x67ef9e)
    #3 gpr_arena_destroy(gpr_arena*) /usr/local/google/home/juanlishen/wip/revert_arena_fix/grpc/src/core/lib/gpr/arena.cc:110 (h2_compress_nosec_test+0x67f200)

    #6 send_message_on_complete(void*, grpc_error*) /usr/local/google/home/juanlishen/wip/revert_arena_fix/grpc/src/core/ext/filters/http/message_compress/message_compress_filter.cc:204 (discriminator 1) (h2_compress_nosec_test+0x6bc87f)
```

It's not fixed until the PR is merged. :)
